markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 637 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the transmutation school of magic, typically changing something’s form.
name: Transmutation
